snippet.title: Gotham Knights - World Premiere 4K Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the world premiere of #GothamKnights in #4K!
 
Batman is dead. It is now up to the #BatmanFamily - #Batgirl, #Nightwing, #RedHood, and #Robin - to protect Gotham City, bring hope to its citizens, discipline to its cops, and fear to its criminals. You must evolve into the new Dark Knight and save #Gotham from chaos.

Learn more: http://go.wbgames.com/GothamKnights

Connect with Gotham Knights online:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GothamKnights
Facebook: https://facebook.com/GothamKnights
Instagram: https://instagram.com/GothamKnights
Discord: Discord.gg/GothamKnights 

Official WB Montreal Channels:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WBGamesMTL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wbgamesmtl/
